item.title: Goldman Sachs downgrades Target, citing growth concerns
item.description: Uncertainty around tariffs and brewing recessionary fears may put pressure on Target in the near term, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades this 'prime beneficiary' of defense exports, calls for more than 20% upside
item.description: Shares of Lockheed Martin could be slated for more gains from here, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Nvidia issued a big warning related to China exports. What analysts are saying
item.description: Nvidia's warning led some analysts to trim their outlook on the chipmaker.

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages posted their first losing day in three Tuesday, but investors' tariff worries seemed to ease. Here's what CNBC is watching Wednesda...

item.title: These 3 stocks in the news on Tuesday have trading potential, Jeff Kilburg says
item.description: Jeff Kilburg, founder and CEO of KKM Financial, discussed Netflix, Johnson & Johnson and Under Armour on CNBC's "Power Lunch."
